description:
Calibre 8.0 open-source ebook management software is now available for download with much improved Kobo support and other changes. Here's what's new!

The post Calibre 8.0 Ebook Manager Released with Much Improved Kobo Support appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Calibre 8.0 Ebook Manager Released with Much Improved Kobo Support
